info.+content: Natsumi and Miyuki are policewomen at the Bokuto Police Station. This story recounts the exploits and adventures they have in dealing with the strange characters they are forced to deal with 'all in a day's work'.
"100mph no Yuuki" by Akiko Hiramatsu & Sakiko Tamagawa (eps 01-04)
"Arittake no Joonetsu de" by Tokyo Policewoman Duo (eps 01-04)
#2: "Looking Up To The Sky" by Takako Shirai (eps 26-51)

title.+content: File 5: The Beauty, Her Name is Aoi

File 26: Red dress and a knife
File 29: The battle for Miyuki. Ken's challenger!
File 33: Eeeek! It's Toki the idol!
File 39: The challenge of beach volleyball man
File 44: Halloween at the station (Bokuto station ghost diaries)
File 45: The summer of keeping promises
File 50: The Investigation at Bokuto Station
File Special: Diverting Traffic at the Beach

release.+content: You're Under Arrest - Box Set 2 + Extras Disc (DVD 4-6)
